title: Ep: 015 - Pulling Back The Curtain on the World of Fashion
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Fashion Designer and Creative Director Ashley Tyler as she pulls back the curtain on the inner workings of the fashion world. Ashley has worked for some of the biggest names in fashion including Ralph Lauren, Calvin Klein and Benneton just to name a few. Listen as we discuss how Ashley got her start in the fashion world, creatively approaches the design process and how she bootstrapped her own fashion line. It is a fascinating conversation.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
